name: smeary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
covered with smears (= dirty marks made by spreading a liquid or a thick substance over a surface): The dog's nose had made smeary marks on the glass. After a week of travelling, my map had become a smeary mess.
More examplesFewer examplesShe finally stopped crying and her smeary face looked calmer.Some of the photos were fine but the out of focus ones were smeary and indistinct. The cafe was full of screaming babies, smeary trays, and spilled ketchup.He watched through a smeary window as people hurried past in the rain.
